
A    11010101001010111
B    00100101000100111
    
r +  11111010001101110
    
a &  00000101000000111
b |  11110101001110111
c ^  11110000001110000
                      
----------------------

r +  11111010001101110

a &  00000101000000111
b |  11110101001110111
c ^  11110000001110000
a<   00001010000001110
b<   11101010011101110
c<   11100000011100000




(
a<   00001010000001110   |
{
c ^  11110000001110000   &
c<   11100000011100000
}
)=   11101010001101110

b |  11110101001110111

r +  11111010001101110
